    "I'm Megatron and Galvatron in one bot, and that can't change"Said 
 =
   Hydras"My goals are destroy maximals and change the past in order 
    t=
he future belongs to Decepticon's decendants: the Predacons!  And I

n offer you apiece of power in that world...."





  Pondering that a mome=
nt. Her optics narrowed a little. "Only a piece?"

  Shifting. She was a De=
cepticon, yet it would be going to these supposed wannabes?! "How do you in=
tend on .. 'Changing' the past. If.. I am allowed to ask."

  She hoped tha=
t it did NOT involve Megatron.. the original Megatron & the Decepticons who=
 were on this planet, in stasis in the Ark. Which, she knew where it was. P=
lus, she knew where the location of the crashed Decepticon ship was that ha=
d the Heart of Cybertron in it. But, that had to stay a secret for some tim=
e. Megatron would need it later. 

  Looking Hydras up & down, the appeal a=
bout him was definitely uncanny. She may be loyal to him, she may not. It d=
epended upon how he treated & valued her.

ubject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
